dcterms:description: A synthetic translation task involving shifting alphabetic sequences where each letter is shifted by a fixed number to ensure no overlapping between source and target sequences.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Translation Tasks (Shifting Alphabetic Sequences)

dcterms:description: A synthetic translation task based on Caesar's cipher, where each letter in the source sequence is replaced by a letter some fixed number of positions down the alphabet.
